name: Claude
description: AI assistant developed by Anthropic, excels at analysis, writing, math, programming, creative writing and other tasks. Supports contextual conversations and complex reasoning.

name: ChatGPT
description: OpenAI's large language model capable of natural conversation, answering questions, assisting with writing, programming, and various other tasks.

name: GitHub Copilot
description: AI-powered code completion tool that provides intelligent suggestions and auto-completion while you code, supporting multiple programming languages.

name: Cursor
description: Code editor designed specifically for AI-assisted programming, with a powerful built-in AI programming assistant that can understand your entire codebase.

name: Midjourney
description: Top-tier AI image generation tool accessible via Discord bot, capable of generating high-quality artwork and concept images.

name: Stable Diffusion
description: Open-source text-to-image generation model that can run locally, generating high-quality images with support for various styles and controls.

name: Notion AI
description: AI writing assistant integrated into Notion, helping generate, edit, and summarize content to improve document and note-taking efficiency.

name: Runway
description: AI-powered creative toolkit offering video generation, image editing, 3D modeling, and various other creative AI features.

name: Zapier
description: Workflow automation platform connecting thousands of applications with AI-enhanced automation rules to boost productivity.

name: Figma AI
description: Built-in AI design assistant in Figma, helping generate design elements, optimize interface layouts, and provide design suggestions.

name: Tableau AI
description: Data visualization platform with integrated AI features that automatically generates charts, discovers data insights, and provides intelligent analysis suggestions.

name: Grammarly
description: AI-powered writing assistant providing grammar checking, writing suggestions, tone adjustment, and support for multiple languages.
